field.name: ma_dvcs
field.check: ma_dvcs not in (select ma_dvcs from dmdvcs where status = '1')⩓ma_dvcs in (select distinct ma_dvcs from dmdvcsks where year(ngay_ks) >= @year)

field.name: ma_vt
field.check: ma_vt not in (select ma_vt from dmvt)

field.name: ma_px
field.check: ma_px not in (select ma_px from sfdmxuong)

field.name: ma_lsx
field.check: ma_lsx <> '' and ma_lsx not in (select ma_lsx from cs2$000000 where status in ('2', '3', '4'))

field.name: ma_cd
field.check: ma_cd <> '' and ma_cd not in (select ma_cd from ctrt)⩓ma_lsx <> '' and ma_cd <> '' and not exists(select 1 from sfctwo b where @@table.ma_cd = b.ma_cd and @@table.ma_lsx = b.ma_lsx)

field.name: ma_lo
field.check: @@table.ma_lo = '' and exists(select 1 from dmvt b where @@table.ma_vt = b.ma_vt and b.lo_yn = 1)⩓@@table.ma_lo <> '' and not exists(select 1 from dmvt b where @@table.ma_vt = b.ma_vt and b.lo_yn = 1)⩓@@table.ma_lo <> '' and not exists(select 1 from dmlo b where @@table.ma_lo = b.ma_lo and @@table.ma_vt = b.ma_vt)

field.name: loai
field.check: loai <> '' and loai not in (select ma_loai from sfdmtttk)
